Package model

Class SpaceShip

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
model.SpaceShip
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class SpaceShip extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
The SpaceShip class represents a player's spaceship in a Space Invaders game. It extends ImageView to display the spaceship as an image.

  • Property Summary

    addLife()
    Increases the number of lives for the spaceship.

    changeToBalancedShip()
    Changes the spaceship to a "Balanced Ship" (default/starter ship) with adjusted speed and lives.
    void

    Changes the spaceship to a "Chunky Ship" with adjusted speed and lives.
    void

    Changes the spaceship to a "Speedy Ship" with adjusted speed and lives.

    Deletes the bullet object, indicating that the bullet is no longer active on the screen.

    Fires a bullet from the spaceship at the current position.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpaceShip

      public SpaceShip(javafx.scene.image.Image image, String name, int speed, int lives)
      Constructs a SpaceShip object with the specified image, name, speed, and initial lives.
      Parameters:
      image - The image representing the spaceship.
      name - The name of the spaceship.
      speed - The speed of the spaceship.
      lives - The initial number of lives for the spaceship.
